thread.title: Baseball is in shock as one of its most promising young pitchers has been killed at the age of 25
thread.title_full: Baseball is in shock as one of its most promising young pitchers has been killed at the age of 25

author: coxrare
title: Baseball is in shock as one of its most promising young pitchers has been killed at the age of 25
text:
Rare News January 22, 2017 12:20 pm Baseball is in shock as one of its most promising young pitchers has been killed at the age of 25   We are devastated by the tragic news that Yordano Ventura, 25, has died in an automobile accident. https://t.co/RXibkDJMHZ pic.twitter.com/S7RszxJF8d 
Yordano Ventura, a young pitcher for the Kansas City Royals who pumped fast balls to the plate exceeding triple digits, was killed in a car crash Saturday in the Dominican Republic. He was 25. 
The Royals confirmed his death: It is with a heavy and broken heart that we confirm the passing of Yordano Ventura. The club will release a statement soon. #RIPAce 
RELATED: Former top baseball prospect killed in car crash. 
The photos of the crash are heartbreaking. Lamentable!! : Se trata del pelotero YORDANO VENTURA la persona fallecida en accidente en Juan Adrián en la madrugada de hoy pic.twitter.com/UiX5F4il2H 
— Jacobo Mateo Moquete (@Jacobommoquete) January 22, 2017 Atención : accidente carretera Juan Adrián, se espera identificación del fallecido. Vehículo pertenece al pelotero Yordano Ventura. pic.twitter.com/obP8PhbbY4 
— Jacobo Mateo Moquete (@Jacobommoquete) January 22, 2017 
Yordano broke into the big leagues with the Royals in 2013 and was 38-31 with a 3.89 ERA. He was a key member of pitching staff that carried the Royals to World Series appearances in 2014 and 2015. Our thoughts and prayers are with the @Royals organization on the tragic news of Yordano Ventura's passing. pic.twitter.com/ymiJwEmFHR 
— Kansas City Chiefs (@Chiefs) January 22, 2017 
It’s the second young pitcher who has died under tragic circumstances in the last few month. Jose Fernandez died in a boating accident in late September . 
Tragically, former major leaguer Andy Marte, at just 33, was killed in a separate crash on Saturday in the Dominican Republic.
